text: Away colours are a choice of coloured clothing used in team sports. It is used when 2 clubs clash colors, as 1 club needs to wear their away colours. An away kit usually consists of the same home kit but with reversed colors. ==Related pages== * Throwback uniform * Road (sports) ==Other websites== * Galleries of historical soccer kits: English clubs & Scottish clubs * True Colours Football Kits history site Category:Sports clothing Category:Sports words
title: Away colours
